entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 08:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 2.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 98 %
Dewpoint: 2.4°C
Wind: SE 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A
